overview: In the annual Ultra Marat칩n Caballo Blanco, runners compete in the spectacular Copper Canyon of Chihuahua, Mexico, home to the indigenous Rar치muri people. The town of Urique has hosted the event since 2004, after an American athlete created the race as a way for the Rar치muri, who are known for their endurance running, to honor and preserve their culture.
title: The Infinite Race
